msItem.title: A submission from Siwa (evidently the Mahratta Shiwaji) to Aurangzib.
msItem.note: Shiwaji (and his Persian secretaries?). For further details see Codrington/Reade No 345 (1). Work is a firmly stated protest against Aurangzib's imposition of the jizya on the Hindus. Scribe is probably Muhammad Muhammadi (?), scribe of Codrington/Reade 345 (3)

listBibl.bibl: For Price's bequest see J.R.A.S., iii (1836), pp. xii-xiv, lx.

origin.p: 23 Safar A.H. 121[0] (8 September 1795). So rather than 1121: cf. Codrington/Reade 435 (1) and (3)

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
